_comment: OpenClaw Agent Configuration Patch - Add this to your agents.list array
_instructions: 2. Open the file in an editor
4. Add these agent entries to the 'list' array
5. Restart OpenClaw gateway: openclaw gateway restart

agents_to_add.name: Jarvis
agents_to_add.description: Squad Lead - coordinates all agents and assigns tasks

agents_to_add.name: Shuri
agents_to_add.description: Product Analyst - market research and competitive analysis

agents_to_add.name: Fury
agents_to_add.description: Customer Researcher - user interviews and feedback synthesis

agents_to_add.name: Vision
agents_to_add.description: SEO Analyst - keyword research and search optimization

agents_to_add.name: Loki
agents_to_add.description: Content Writer - blog posts, copy, and content strategy

agents_to_add.name: Quill
agents_to_add.description: Social Media Manager - scheduling, engagement, and analytics

agents_to_add.name: Wanda
agents_to_add.description: Designer - mockups, wireframes, and brand assets

agents_to_add.name: Pepper
agents_to_add.description: Email Marketing - campaigns, sequences, and newsletters

agents_to_add.name: Wong
agents_to_add.description: Documentation - docs, guides, and API references

_example_usage.description: After adding these agents, you can interact with them via OpenClaw
commands: openclaw chat @fury 'Summarize this week's user feedback'
openclaw chat @vision 'Find SEO opportunities for our blog'
openclaw chat @loki 'Write a blog post about feature X'
openclaw chat @quill 'Schedule social posts for next week'
openclaw chat @wanda 'Design a landing page mockup'
openclaw chat @pepper 'Create an onboarding email sequence'
openclaw chat @wong 'Document the new API endpoints'
